meanings.definition: The most important or best part of something.
meanings.sent1: In the play, the actor's performance in the final scene was the primes of the entire show.
meanings.sent2: The primes of the movie was the unexpected plot twist at the end.
meanings.sent3: The birthday cake was delicious, but the primes was definitely the chocolate frosting.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the primes that lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The breathtaking view from the mountaintop was the primes of the hike.

meanings.definition: To prepare someone or something for a particular purpose or situation.
meanings.sent1: She primes the canvas before starting her painting to ensure the colors stand out.
meanings.sent2: Before the race, the coach primes the athletes by leading them through warm-up exercises.
meanings.sent3: The chef primes the ingredients before cooking to make the process smoother.
meanings.sent4: He primes the pump before drawing water from the well.
meanings.sent5: The teacher primes the students with a review before the exam.

meanings.definition: To cover a surface with a layer of paint.
meanings.sent1: She primes the walls before painting to ensure the color looks vibrant.
meanings.sent2: The artist primes the canvas with a white base before starting the artwork.
meanings.sent3: He primes the fence with a fresh coat of paint to protect it from the weather.
meanings.sent4: The carpenter primes the wood before applying the final coat of paint.
meanings.sent5: The homeowner primes the metal gate before painting it a bright red.

meanings.definition: To make someone ready for a particular job or activity.
meanings.sent1: The coach primes the team before the championship game to boost their confidence.
meanings.sent2: She primes her students with practice tests before the final exam.
meanings.sent3: He primes the actors with a pep talk before the opening night performance.
meanings.sent4: The mentor primes the intern with valuable skills for the new project.
meanings.sent5: The parent primes the child for school by helping them pack their backpack.
